name: Offroad Truck Hilux Adven
description:
Offroad Truck Hilux Adven is a realistic simulation and racing game that you need to climb hills by overcoming the obstacles by an off-road vehicle. The off-road drivers on the bumpy road in the mountain, you need to control the hill climb hilux car like monster truck wheel carefully to travel over the meandering road.
• Explore a detailed realistic open hill environment.
• Accurate driving physics and controls for Steering
• Different realistic weather conditions with different ambient
• Amazing effect of driving experience in all weather conditions
• New physical engine with its specific features of each truck
• Impossibly realistic vehicle and atmosphere sounds
